div.p: The SHS community continues to dance For The Kids

figcaption.h2:
SPOTLIGHT ON GRIT AND
GROWTH MINDSET
figcaption.p: READ HOWSTUDENTS AND STAFF EXHIBIT A GRIT AND GROWTH MINDSET

a.data-page-name: Spotlight on a Grit and Growth Mindset

div.p: Reading a book that changes your perspective on life.
Playing an instrument that feels as natural as breathing.
Making new friends while being part of a team.
Giving your heart and hands to someone in need.
For students, these are the moments that provide a window into who they are, how they learn, and the kind of life they want to lead. And they are different for everybody.

Springfield School Districts goal is to provide a dynamic learning environment that allows students to experience these moments, confident that, wherever they are going, they have what it takes to get there.
